peril.model.combat

Class CombatHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.combat.CombatHelper

  • public final class CombatHelper
extends java.util.Observable
    Helps the game by performing a round of combat denoted by a CombatRound passed to fight(CombatRound). The results of this round of combat can are view.
    Since:
    2018-03-11
    Version:
    1.01.09
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Observable, CombatRound, CombatView, ModelSquad, ModelSquadMember

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameController game
      The GameController that allows this CombatHelper to query the state of the game.
      static int MAX_ATTACK_SQUAD_SIZE
      The maximum size of an attacking squad.
      static int MAX_DEFEND_SQUAD_SIZE
      The maximum size of an defending squad.
      private java.util.Random random
      The Random that generated the dice rolls.
      CombatView view
      The CombatView that denotes the results of the previous round of combat.

      Performs a round of combat between the ModelCountrys and ModelSquads defined by the parameter CombatRound.

      Retrieves a Integer[] of random six sided dice rolls.

      private void removeUnitFromArmy(ModelSquad squad, ModelArmy army, ModelUnit enemyUnit)
      First attempts to remove the specified enemy ModelUnit from the specified ModelSquad and if that is not possible if returns the ModelSquadMembers back to the specified ModelArmy then remove the enemy ModelUnit from the ModelArmy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CombatHelper

        public CombatHelper(GameController game)
        Constructs an new CombatHelper.
        Parameters:
        game - The GameController that allows this CombatHelper to query the state of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • fight

        public void fight(CombatRound round)
        Performs a round of combat between the ModelCountrys and ModelSquads defined by the parameter CombatRound. The results of this CombatRound will be stored in view until the CombatHelper is clear() or the next fight(CombatRound).
        Parameters:
        round - The CombatRound specifying the details of this fight.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears this CombatHelper.

      • getTotalAliveUnits

        public int getTotalAliveUnits(ModelArmy army,
                              ModelSquad squad)
        Retrieves the total number of alive ModelUnits when the specified ModelArmy and the ModelSquad.
        Parameters:
        army - The ModelArmy to be combined.
        squad - The ModelSquad to be combined.
        Returns:
        The total number of alive ModelUnits.

      • processPostFight

        private void processPostFight(CombatRound round,
                              ModelPlayer attackingPlayer,
                              ModelPlayer defendingPlayer)
        Processes the state of the specified CombatRound after the compareDiceRolls(CombatRound, Integer[], Integer[]) has been performed.
        Parameters:
        round - The CombatRound to be processed.
        attackingPlayer - The ModelPlayer that started the attack.
        defendingPlayer - The ModelPlayer that defended against the attack.

      • compareDiceRolls

        private void compareDiceRolls(CombatRound round,
                              java.lang.Integer[] attackerDiceRolls,
                              java.lang.Integer[] defenderDiceRolls)
        Compares the specified dice rolls and performs the combat on the elements of the specified CombatRound.
        Parameters:
        round - The CombatRound specifying the details of this fight.
        attackerDiceRolls - The dice rolls of the attacker.
        defenderDiceRolls - The dice rolls of the defender.

      • processDamage

        private boolean processDamage(ModelPlayer victor,
                              ModelPlayer loser,
                              ModelArmy army,
                              ModelSquad squad,
                              ModelUnit unit)
        Processes a fight with the specified victor and loser. The strength of the specified ModelUnit is dealt as damage to the specified ModelArmy and ModelSquad.
        Parameters:
        victor - The ModelPlayer that rules the ModelCountry that has won this round of the war.
        loser - The ModelPlayer that rules the ModelCountry that has lost this round of the war.
        army - The army from the ModelCountry that has lost this round of the war.
        squad - The squad that was defending the ModelCountry that has lost this round of the war.
        unit - The unit that will damage the attacker ModelArmy and ModelSquad.
        Returns:
        Whether this ModelUnit's damage has caused the war to end.

      • removeUnitFromArmy

        private void removeUnitFromArmy(ModelSquad squad,
                                ModelArmy army,
                                ModelUnit enemyUnit)
        First attempts to remove the specified enemy ModelUnit from the specified ModelSquad and if that is not possible if returns the ModelSquadMembers back to the specified ModelArmy then remove the enemy ModelUnit from the ModelArmy.
        Parameters:
        squad - The ModelSquad that will be returned to the specified ModelArmy.
        army - The ModelArmy that the ModelSquad will be returned to if the ModelUnit is not removed from it.
        enemyUnit - The ModelUnit that will be removed from the ModelSquad or ModelArmy.

      • getDiceRolls

        private java.lang.Integer[] getDiceRolls(int numberOfRolls)
        Retrieves a Integer[] of random six sided dice rolls.
        Parameters:
        numberOfRolls - The Integer[] number of rolls
        Returns:
        The Integer[] dice rolls.
